1.Title: Stampede Accident
1.Description: When any friendly unit in the squad attacks and hits an enemy, all friendly units' ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>2.5%</color> for 8s, stacking up to 4 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately, and each friendly unit can provide 1 stack of the buff. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
